entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
